Name: Devil Tears
About the game: The devil is trapped in his own hell, and now he needs to get out of the trap, because someone drops objects on him that can crush him. Devil Tears is a 2D platformer in which the player jumps over the cells, heading for the exit, blocks fall from above that can crush him, spikes are placed on the levels. You must overcome all levels using your reaction and logical thinking. Features of the game: - Complexity - Beautiful visual style - Dynamic Music
